EmailTemplate.subject: Set up your Bigcommerce store before your trial ends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You still have 3 days in your trial. Log in to launch your store or pick a plan that's right for you Resources <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Welcome-to-Bigcommerce-University-Video/]]>| Log in <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
You still have three days in your free trial
Set up your store Start now <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Don't lose your trial
We noticed you haven't set up your online store yet. You can set it up in just a few easy steps by logging in now.
Or, upgrade to the right plan and get the time you need to finish building your store.
Upgrade your plan Â» <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
